docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, April 6 (U.P.) -- The Paraguayan revolt has spread from the north to the south and now threatens to encircle and isolate Asuncion, the capital. Today the garrison at Alberdi announced it would side with the insurgents.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, April 6 (U.P.) -- The Paraguayan revolt has spread from the north to the south and now threatens to encircle and isolate Asuncion, the capital. Today the garrison at Alberdi announced it would side with the insurgents.
docs.abstract: revolt spreads southward as Port Alberdi forces join rebels; Govt supply line to Argentina lengthened; Pres Morinigo's position reptd shaky; Govt repts gains; rebels ask internatl recognition of belligerency; map

headline.main: PARAGUAY REVOLT SPREADS TO SOUTH; Garrison Below Asuncion Joins Insurgents, Blocking Supply Route From Argentina

docs.snippet: Curtailment of domestic demand for women's apparel has stepped up efforts of coat, suit and dress manufacturers to expand their exports. Despite numerous obstacles, such as lack of foreign exchange and stiff tariff barriers, all signs point to a...
docs.lead_paragraph: Curtailment of domestic demand for women's apparel has stepped up efforts of coat, suit and dress manufacturers to expand their exports. Despite numerous obstacles, such as lack of foreign exchange and stiff tariff barriers, all signs point to a record year in finished wearing apparel, a survey of the trade indicated last week.
docs.abstract: Mfrs increase efforts to expand exports; survey reveals record yr despite exch stringency and stiff tariff barriers; buyers on export outlook

headline.main: GARMENT INDUSTRY PUSHING EXPORTS; Record Year Indicated Despite Exchange Stringency and Stiff Tariff Barriers GARMENT INDUSTRY PUSHING EXPORTS
